inn1.comm: nice start straightaway for Praveen,  gets it to jag back in and catch Watson's pad pretty high
keeps it just outside off and gets it to move in, opens the face just slightly and places it wide of gully
goes right across his stumps to cover the movement and pats it back down the pitch
this one holds its line and straightens before reaching the keeper, Marsh prods forward, well bowled
he pitches it up this time and Marsh's straight drive is mistimed back to the bowler
swings it away from the left-hander and Marsh does well to let it go, nice start for Praveen
Nehra fires it in to the right hander after pitching and cramps Watson for room to cut, he ends up chopping it to the off side

vociferous appeal but i think it was too high, pitches on off and middle and comes back in and catches the top flap of the pad as he shapes to defend, Nehra loses his voice in the appeal and Saheba shakes his head
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
he pitches it up and swings it in and Watson mistimes the on drive and places it wide of midwicket for a couple
drifts a bit on the pads and watson tries to tickle it away
effort delivery but Watson ducks and lets it go down the leg side
hits the deck hard again and Watson connects well with the pull but finds Praveen at fine leg
swings it away slightly and Watson chops it down to cover
fuller in length and driven to the same fielder, this time on the front foot
he hits the deck hard but misdirects the bouncer down the leg side, Watson bends down slightly and lets it sail over him
crispy on drive but straight to Harbhajan at mid-on
he finds the gap this time, drifts on the pads and he eases it away with the swing and places it just wide of Jadeja at midwicket, this outfield is quick
nasty incutter from Praveen, cuts back in so sharply that Watson ends up getting an inside edge which sneaks between his pads
gets it to move away from the left-hander and Marsh gets across his stumps and taps it gently
he keeps the batsman on his toes by getting a bit of extra bounce, gets it to cut back in off the surface
well just misdirected towards the pads and Watson is quick to shuffle and flick it past midwicket
well left by marsh, it was a nice away swinger just outside the line of the off stump
holds the length back slightly and Marsh gets across and pushes it down to mid-on
fullish in length and swinging away, he gets beside the line and pushes it point
gets across his stumps and plays it across the line towards square leg for a single
swings it away and Marsh plays across the line and picks a single to fine leg
nearly rattled his stumps there, there's plenty of inward movement and Watson gets a thick inside edge past his stumps on the drive
gets forward and pushes it down to cover
tries to flick it fine but he mistimes it to short square leg
nice straight drive intercepted by Yuvraj at mid-off, loud cheers for the local boy
too close to cut but he ends u[p chopping it wide of gully, Watson's played a few of those today
good length outside off and he pushes it firmly down to extra cover
places it down to third man and Harbhajan fires an accurate throw to the keeper
fires it on a good length and Marsh is happy to shoulder arms
picks it from outside off and flicks with conviction but he finds Jadeja at midwicket
fires it just outside the line of the off stump and Marsh lets that one go
that's good running, he pushes it with soft hands in front of mid-off and calls quickly for the single, easy run there
pitches it up outside off and he taps it to mid-off
gives him just a bit more of width outside off and he dabs it wide of backward point, third man picks it up
Ishant is square at third man and he picks it up as Watson plays a cut
nearly spoons it on the full! Marsh checks his shot and the ball jus drops short of Sehwag at short cover
lands it just wide outside off and he shuffles and clips it down to midwicket
shuffles just a bit and flicks him down to fine leg
gets across and pushes it down to mid-on
goes across a bit and taps it down to short cover, I didn't get the speed but Nehra's bowling them quick today

no doubts about that! That was a vicious inswinger screeching towards the pads on a full length, Marsh had to really hurry at the crease to whip it to the on side but he was beaten for pace, the ball strikes the base of the pad and Nehra knows he's got him

what a way to start! Nehra drops it short and it's a quick delivery but Ponting's in such good form that it takes less than a second to get his eye in, swivel and pull firmly over square leg, I liked the sound and sight of that
gets beside the line and steers it softly to the off side
meanwhile Praveen works on his inswing, defended with soft hands by Watson
covers the stumps and defends with a straight bat down to mid-off
drifts on the pads and he easily works it away down to fine leg
half hearted appeal, Praveen gets it to nip back in a touch and clip the pad just outside the line of off, that wasn't hittng
stays behind the line this time and pushes it softly to mid-on
takes a bit of pace off the ball and Ponting gets forward a little early, realises there's no point forcing it away so he checks his shot to cover
angles it on the pads and he clips him down to square leg
on the pads again and Praveen has a bit of work to do to run across from fine leg, they complete the second easily
Watson goes fishing outside the off stump and nearly dabs it to Dhoni, bit of away swing and extra bounce there
took some time coming but that's an effortless loft, stays at the crease to a pitched up delivery and swings through the line and beats mid-on comfortably
pushes it towards mid-on and completes a sharp single
nudges it close to the pads and the ball dribbles to the on side, Watson tells Ponting to hurry up
lands it on a good length outside off, he gets forward and taps it down to cover
and the batsman nearly gives Dhoni catching practice, an attempted dab to third man nearly costs his wicket
gets beside the line and steers him down to point
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to sweeper cover
not one for the album but Watson won't complain, he tries to bang that over square leg but gets an inside edge which runs down to fine leg, the fielder was too square I reckon
he reaches out and powers it through the off side but sweeper cover's there to cut it off
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
bends his knee to flash it through the off side but he ends up placing it straight to Harbhajan at third man
extra bounce this time and Ponting does well to drop his wrists and fend it off
not the most attractive of shots, he reaches out to flash at one wide of the off side and his left leg is in the air on the follow through, that' the kind of shot I play sometimes in office cricket
he takes him downtown this time and what a clean hit, pitched up on middle and leg and he lofts through the line with little effort and clears wide long-on
goes down the ground again, pitched up outside off this time, he scoops it over mid-off but there isn't enough to clear the boundary, nevertheless a good shot
gets beside the line and steers him down to third man
swings it in and he tucks it down to midwicket and pushes a single, Jadeja's throw hits Watson flush on the back and he apologises
swings it and sits up nicely on the pads asking to be hit, rolls his wrists and whips him high over midwicket, don't chase that, it's four
shows the full face of the bat and pushes it through the line to long-on
Praveen get lucky this time with his line as he strays on the pads with the fine leg up, Ponting fails to beat that fielder
better, on the off stump this time and the batsman finds mid-off
easy does it, Ishant swings it towards middle and leg and it's such a placid pitch that Watson has to turn his wrists only slightly to work it past midwicket
holds the length back and he firmly pushes it back to the bowler
gives him a bit of room and he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
tries to bang that through the off side on seeing the width and he ends up chopping it down to mid-off
gets behind the line and taps it to the off side
defended solidly off the front foot to short cover
shoulders arms, goes straight through to the keeper
gets forward and defends with a dead bat to the off side
gets forward and defends to the off side again
outside edge and no slip, nicely tossed up and no real turn, lucky escape for Watson
short and biffed through the off side, sweeper cover;s there to cut it off
full outside off and driven down to extra cover
gets beside the line and angles it wide of backward point
takes some pace off the ball and Ponting reads it quickly and checks his shot to the on side
fullish in length outside off and he chips it slightly in the air wide of the fielder at extra cover, can't call that a chance
he shapes to drive straight but almost gets a leading edge, beats the bowler and it's a single to long-off
jams it hard down the pitch and Ishant leaps up to stop the ball
fullish in length outside off and he drives straight to Raina at cover
flighted outside off, he gets forward and drives to short cover
thinks of a single to short cover but the non-striker sends him back
close call for lbw! Comes forward and it was pad first and then bat, good shout, Hawkeye says that would hagve shaved the off stump, fair call from the umpire
tucked to midwicket
pushed to deep extra cover
gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-on
slower ball and he commits to the front foot early and checks his drive to mid-off
drops it short and it's all too easy for Ponting as he swivels, gets on top of the bounce and pulls over square leg
pitched it up outside off and he reaches forward and scoops it over extra cover, not enough fuel to get to the rope  though
drifts on the pads and works it down to mid-on
flush on the arm, the ball bounces a lot quicker than Watson expected and as a result the ball strikes his arm as he shapes to bludgeon it over midwicket
gets beside the line and taps it down to long-on

the bowling change works! He tosses it up outside off and there's a bit of extra bounce on this one, a half-hearted dab finds the outside edge and Dhoni and gang know it, Watson walks back for a very decent 49
gets forward to the pitch of the ball and defends
gets forward and pushes it down the pitch
gets right across his stumps and clips him down to square leg
pushed through quicker and he's quick to defend that away
uses his wrists to clip it with the turn to the on side
fullish outside off and driven to cover
fullish outside off and pushed just wide of cover
stays behind the line and pushes it to the off side
driven down the ground to long-off
drifts on middle and leg and he clips him down to short square leg
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
oh nice turn there, forces Ponting to check his cut
lunges forward and opts to defend
he pushes it through quicker and Ponting gets forward again and defends
gently tossed up on middle and off and Ponting gets across, bends his knee and slog sweeps him over square leg, bisects the gap between two fielders
gets across and pushes it to the on side
tucks it straight to mid-on
driven down the pitch and Yuvraj tries to stop it but the ball deflects off Ponting's foot
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives wide of mid-off
fuller in length on the pads and he digs it out to midwicket
slow through the air and defended with a dead bat
in the slot to drive and he pushes it firmly down to long-off
slow through the air and he defends to the off side
floated on the pads and meekly pushed away to short midwicket
much quicker through the air and Harbhajan fields well off his own bowling
now Raina tumbles at mid-on to cut it off and he;s in some discomfort
knocked down to cover point and White's a bit slow off the blocks but completes the single easily
tries to paddle it away but it doesn't come off
White decides to try his luck with a chipped shot and he scoops it well wide of the bowler and down to long-on
pushed wide of the bowler again to long-on
tosses it up wide outside off and he reaches out and drives firmly along the carpet to sweeper cover
too wide outside off, he ends up hitting it to sweeper cover but he ought to have smacked that
tossed up slowly outside off and defended
drifts down the leg side and Ponting fails to make contact with the sweep
tossed up gently and he waits patiently for it before firmly drilling it down thje ground to long-on
gets forward and smothers the spin
gets on his knee and tries to shovel it from outside the off stump and the ball hits his pads but outside the line of off
gets forward and pushes it down the ground to long-off
sweeps and chips it in the air over midwicket
gets forward and defends
stays back and defends with a dead bat, quicker one
makes room and tries to cut and nearly gets a thick outside edge, close call
this time he makes proper contact with the cut and places it square of the wicket
full on the off stump and worked down to midwicket
that's his fifty! Tossed up on the pads and he gently tickles it down to fine leg, this man's in good touch
clips it straight to midwicket
tries to paddle it away with the turn but the ball misses the bat and the legstump

brilliant work by Jadeja! Ponting shuffles and clips it behind square on the on side, one of the fielders (I think Raina) gives the chase but allows Jadeja to gather it as he runs forward from deep square leg, a direct hit at the keeper's end sent Ponting back and it was obvious. Ponting was casual with the first run and he hesitated a bit before taking the second run and that led to his undoing
gets forward and defends to the off side
full outside off and driven down the ground to long-off
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
continues round the wicket to the left-hander, defended with a dead bat
fuller in length and dug out to long-off
gets forward and drives to deep extra cover
stays back and punches it down to wide long-off
chips it in the air but safe, down to long-on
tossed up and defended with a dead bat
gets on his knee, picks it from wide outside off and it's in the air and safe down to deep midwicket
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
makes room and cuts to sweeper cover
the top spinner and he clips it to the on side
gets on his knee early and chips it high down to deep square leg
gets forward and pushes it to short cover
works it with the turn to midwicket
slow through the air and punched back to the bowler
gets to the pitch of the ball and knocked down to long-on
quicker through the air and clipped to square leg
short and wide, and cut away to sweeper-cover for one
laps this one from way wide of off stump, and gets it fine enough of fine leg to be able to get two
another short delivery, rocks back and cuts it away, but Harbhajan has a sweeper in place
topspinner, full, and defended back to him
fullish deliver, turning in towards off, and pushed away off the back foot
flighted this time, gets onto the front foot and drives it down the ground
reverse-paddles, from outside off, but can't beat short fine
looks to work it away to on, but the ball is not straight enough for it
this is not even a slog-sweep, this is a slog short-arm jab, gets on to the front foot, picks the length and lofts it over midwicket - effective shot
smart batting, works this one from in front of stumps to midwicket for a single
shorter, faster, and whipped away to midwicket for one
full, on the stumps, defended to leg
flighted, pitches outside leg, turns away, and he drops and runs
topspinner, hurries White into the shot, defended from outside off back to the bowler
flighted this time, on the stumps, gets on to front foot and drives it down the ground
effective sweep shot, from outside off, and hit dead square, between fine leg and midwicket
flighted on off, gets on front foot and defends to cover
big appeal, but umpire calls it wide down the leg side - Dhoni had a case for an appeal, because replays show it hit the pad on the way, hence the noise
shorter this one is, Hussey stays on the back foot and pushes it to midwicket
flat, on the leg stump, turns it around the corner, but can't beat square leg
fulltoss on leg stump, paddled away fine, easy couple for Hussey
lovely shot, half-volley outside off, gets to the pitch of it, and drives it through extra, superbly placed
fuller delivery, and driven down to long-off for one
flat, on the stumps, pushed down the ground
full delivery, Hussey drives it to long-off for an easy single
short, angling away, Hussey runs it down to third man
full delivery, White is slightly early into the shot but manages to keep it down and get a single to long-on
length ball, angling across Hussey, he looks to drop and run but it goes too fast to cover
slower ball gone wrong, way way down the leg side, Dhoni does well to move fast and get his pads behind the ball, which bounces twice before reaching him
length ball, this time he succeeds in dropping and running, takes on Kohli at point and makes it easily
dirven on the up, length ball outside off, driven so hard into the ground that it bounces over the extra cover fielder, interestingly placed in a sense
looks to bounce him, but at 131ks it is so slow that White pulls it handsomely off the front foot, neither fine leg nor midwicket has a chance
flighted on the pads, turned away towards fine leg, they try to scamper for two, but Ishant is quick to come in
angled into the pads, turned around the corner for one
well bowled, full, faster, within the stumps, Hussey looks to delay the shot but has no room to manoeuvre
similar delivery, this time he pushes down the ground
makes room this time, but cuts it one-bounce to extra cover
again no room to play with, and he turns it to midwicket for another dot ball
wide down the leg side, pitches outside and keeps going
drives down the ground, but it's too close to an extended left hand of Yuvraj's
flat, on the leg stump, and pushed down the ground for one
full, within the stumps, looks for the slog, but gets the inside half of the bat, for one to square leg
superb shot, it's not much more than a flick, steps out, gets to the pitch of the ball, and it's all timing - not backlift, not followthrough - that carries it over wide long-on
fired in flat and fast, played back to Yuvraj
another delivery darted in, catches Hussey on the crease, and again defended back to Yuvraj
Jadeja continues to be on the mark, pushded down to long-off
another paddle sweep, fine of fine leg again, two runs again
flat ball, pushed wide of cover for one
short and flat delivery again, not much room, cut away to third man
he is firing them all in, 95ks, turned around the corner from in front of stumps
slows it down this time, leg-stump line, White plays it straight to midwicket

and the golden arm strikes for MSD, Hussey looks for his favourite heave-pull, but this is perhaps a touch too full, hence he is hurried into the shot and hits it straight to Ishant Sharma at deep midwicket
over-pitched, driven down the ground for one
gets a nice short delivery to get him off the mark, with a single to long-off
flighted, in front of the stumps, White defends it
another full and flighted delivery, another defensive shot from White
looks to force it through off side this time but can't beat extra cover - end of a useful spell from Yuvraj
continues to bowl within the stumps, defended off the back foot
full on the pads, and helped away for one
flights it nicely, White has to check the shot at the last time, because this one goes straight with the arm
makes room and drives him down the ground to long-off
short and flat, cut to point
another flat delivery, cut away again, but Kohli makes a fine half-stop at point, only a single ensues as Harbhajan does quick backing up
sharp turn, from outside off to missing leg, good call by Asoka to not call it a  wide
drops and runs, good sharp running, gets a single to short cover
makes room early, hits a widish delivery to wide of sweeper-cover
leaves his stumps exposed again, Harbhajan follows him, and he gets a single to long-on
drops and runs again, to backward point this time
darted into the pads this time, turned away to fine leg
sharp turn and bounce for Jadeja, White does well to drop his wrists and get a single to short third
flat ball again, on the stumps, played back to the bowler
another flat and straight delivery, played back to the bowler again
too close to cut, but he rocks back and does, gets one to Kohli at cover
turned away off the pads for an easy single
steps out, looks to make room too, Jadeja follows him, the ball straightens a touch and gets a leading edge, but he gets a single to cover
lovely shot, always good to watch an inside-out over extra cover, makes a little bit of room, and lofts a full delivery over extra
this time Bhajan gets shorter, flatter and follows him, and White plays it back to the bowler
another nice inside-out shot, just a chip this time, lot of work for Ishant to do at cover boundary
poor shot from Henriques, an almighty slog sweep, misses the topspinner by a week, and has dragged his foot outside - Dhoni is quick to disturb the stumps
nicely flighted, Johnson gets onto the front foot and defends
gets turn this time, flighted, pitches off, turns away and beats a poke from Johnson
full, on the pads, and turned away to on for one
short, flat, opens the face on it, and gets a couple to square of the sweeper-cover
flighted this time, Johnson stretches forward and defends
bowled on the pads, Johnson looks to turn it to fine leg but is beaten by a straight delivery
on the stumps again, no room, and defended off the back foot
another delivery on target, plays with soft hands and open face, and scampers through for one
he starts off with a widish delivery, shaping away, beating Johnson, close to be called a wide but is good enough
this time he comes back to off-stump line, Johnson looks to turn it to leg, gets a leading edge and gets a single to cover
length ball, on the pads, turned away to square leg
full, slightly short of being a yorker, driven down the ground, gets one to Harbhajan at mid-off
slower ball, back of a length, 120ks, no room for White, played to cover for one
but this is not slow, full, and no room, he drives it to the right of Nehra, who stretches and fields, finds White backing up too far and he knocks out the stumps to take the big wicket of White
on the stumps, walks across and gets a single to midwicket
angles it too much, and is a big wide down the leg side
looks to make room, Praveen holds the middle-stump line, all he can get is a single to Ishant at cover
length ball, flicked away off the stumps, gets a couple to wide of square leg
turns it from in front of stumps again, doesn't time this one but gets one
slower one goes wrong, way down the leg side
slower one again, heaved away to deep square leg for one
another slower ball, Manou takes it from outside off and whips it to wide of deep square leg for two
steps out, gets another slower delivery, and he opens the face on it but plays it straight to backward point, dot ball
bowled him, on target again, fuller than good length, straight, and Johnson looks to make room and run it down to third man, he misses it and the middle stump accepts it
short ball, into the ribs, gets the bottom hand off and drops it down for one
full ball, driven down to long-off for one
almost another run-out, drops it towards cover and runs, Manou is slow to start, Sehwag is quick to run in and swoop and throw but misses the stumps at striker's end
almost another wicket, slower ball, Manou adjusts, taking the bottom hand off, and hence it lobs one-bounce to long-off
yorker, he can't do much with it, nice over, five singles and a wicket

well Prakash, Manou is indeed a dead man now in the context of this innings, another run-out here. The slower ball is hit back to Praveen, and Manou is eager to get to strike and has backed up almost half way, and it's an easy direct hit for PK who has all the time in the world to aim and hit
full ball, hit down the ground for a single
regulation speed, back of a length, outside off, straight, and Siddle looks to whip it across the line, and is duly beaten, almost shaves the off stump on its way
another delivery short of driving length, on the stumps, and it's hit just to left of PK, another dot ball

drop chance by Kohli's standards, slower ball fools him completely, gets the back of the bat, so obviously Kohli at point is a touch late to move to his left, he dives even as the ball dies on him, gets his hand under it but lets it go through as he touches the ground
slower ball, gets an outside edge, Dhoni dives to his right to keep them down to a single
makes room, Nehra gets it to rise into his ribs, he can manage just a single down the ground
big appeal for lbw, but this is pitched outside leg, nonetheless Australia manage just one leg-bye
stays back of a length, gives no room, and Hauritz gets outside the line and runs it down to third man
Nehra gets one more, smart slower ball, Siddle makes room and gets another leading edge, easy catch for Jadeja at cover-point
back of a length again, on the pads, and turned away to square leg
fuller and wide outside off, Bollinger lets it go, but it's fair way inside the tram line that is the wide indicator
again beating the room-making batsman by bowling full and wide, not wide enough to be called wide, not close enough for batsman to get bat on it
this time he bowls it too wide, Dhoni doesn't collect it cleanly but Hauritz refuses the bye

the first bit of ordinary fielding is compensated for immediately, Hauritz makes room but manages a limp loft to extra cover, where Yuvraj drops a dolly. Hauritz, meanwhile, wants two, and Yuvraj's throw is accurate, and Praveen runs out Bollinger, the fourth run-out of the innings

inn2.comm: starts off with a lollypop of a half volley outside off which Sehwag scoops with delight way over cover, thanks mate
and now a crisp backfoot punch which finds the fielder at backward point, nice save
too wide outside off, you need two and a half bats to chase that
much better, lands on middle and leg and he clips him away down to fine leg
good line and length, just outside off and good carry as well to the keeper
stays back and taps him down to mid-off, plays with soft hands
angles outside off and he dabs him down to third man for a single
angles it from slightly wide of the crease and he whips it uppishly towards Henriques at square leg, in the air for a bit
works him away behind square on the on side and the ball travels very quickly off the blade, well mopped up by Watson at fine leg
listen to the crowd roar, Siddle errs by giving him width outside off, he stands tall, rolls his wrists and plays a neat backfoot punch past backward point and cover
stays right behind the line and defends back to the bowler
sharp seam movement there and it had Manou in a tangle, he moved to his left and suddenly had to change direction
solid in defense again, they'll cheer anything
Sehwag matches Sachin for style, he gets width outside off and he rolls his wrists, hops a bit at the crease and angles it square on the off side, beats backward point with little effort
keeps it around middle and off and he defends solidly
fuller in length but straight towards the pads, a gentle flick of the wrists is enough to beat midwicket
nightmare over for Johnson, he pitches it up outside off and Sehwag punches on the up and just beats the diving short extra cover fielder, crisp timing again
almost four for the road, an athletic Marsh tumbles at backward point to stop a punched drive off the backfoot
now Sehwag hammers this straight to cover point, that's 12 off the over
nervy moment for Tendulkar as he opens the face of the bat and gets a thick outside edge which falls short of White at second slip, he needs to come closer
punched firmly down the track
opportunity to bang this away through the off side but he chops it to the fielders
tries to tuck it across the line but he ends up pushing it straight to square leg
changes the pace a bit and the batsman is happy to shoulder arms
another slower delivery and Tendulkar watchfully lets it go to the keeper
you can't bowl it there, juicy half volley really wide outside and Sehwag chases it with his flashy blade and scoops it wide of third man
punches it down to the off side for a single

amazing commitment from Bollinger, Tendulkar biffs a wide delivery square of the wicket on the off side and the ball appears to win the race at third man but Bollinger's having none of it, slides and just manages to pull it back
slips down the leg side and wide called
no mercy again for Johnson, gives him too much room outside off and Sehwag bashes that almost with his eyes shut, beats the big gap between extra cover and mid-off
there's more, he bangs it in in short but it's not short enough to trouble Sehwag, he leans back and upper cuts it high over slip
much better line from Siddle, angles it inwards and Tendulkar is watchful outside the off stump
stays back to a good length delivery and punches him down to point
slower in pace but hovering around the off stump line, he's happy to let it go
he shapes to cut this time but the ball nips back in a fraction and as a result he mistimes the shot to cover point
fuller and swinging in, gets forward and defends to cover
nearly gives his wicket away with a slash outside off, good delivery there to cramp him up
reaches out to a wide delivery and mistimes it to cover
nice punch off the backfoot but straight to the fielder at cover point
hits the deck hard and Sehwag allows the bouncer sail over his arched back

soft dismissal in the end, Bollinger wouldn't have expected a wicket with this half volley outside off, Sehwag turned the face of the bat at the point of contact and hence ended up splicing it to Watson who pedaled backwards a few paces at mid-off. Nine times out of 10 Sehwag would have cleared that fielder, not this time
lands outside off and he shoulders arms
holds the length back a bit outside off, he taps it to the off side
fullish in length outside off, in fact very full, Tendulkar gets forward, turns the face of the bat and perfectly finds the gap between mid-off and cover
he's much better off bowling it short of a length to Tendulkar and getting it to angle inwards, on that occasion he didn't offer a shot
Tendulkar has a shy at it and misses, Siddle won't mind
Tendulkar thinks about playing a shot but opts to let it go to the keeper
back of a length outside off, Kohli gets right behind the line and defends it
gets behind the line and taps it to cover point
back of a length again and he hops at the crease to fend it off to the on side
poor line there, down the leg side and an easy tickle was enough for Kohli to send it down to the yawning gap at fine leg
follows it up with an excellent bit of running, taps softly towards extra cover and puts pressure on the fielder
clips it to Bollinger's right and the agile bowler flings himself to effect a good save
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
gets forward and pushes it down towards point
works on that inward angle again to Tendulkar, the batsman isn't chasing that
unlucky for the bowler, Tendulkar gets a half stride forward, drops his wrists and gets a thin outside edge which beats slip and third man who's a bit square to cut that off
keeps it on a good length outside off and he's happy to shoulder arms
watchfully left alone to the keeper again
short of a length and he goes back and tucks him down to mid-on
angles it inwards and he works his wrists to place it wide of midwicket
fullish outside off and pushed down to cover
nice testing line from Bollinger, just a shade outside off and Tendulkar doesn't offer a shot
tucks him up for room outside off and he fends it off high on the bat
steep bounce again and Tendulkar has to hop at the crease to fend it off to the on side, Bollinger gathers the ball quickly
Johnson's woes continue as he dishes it out wide outside off, not at full pace too
much better, right on target on the off stump and Kohli defends
clips him firmly down to square leg and a sharp save limits that to a dot ball
short and he hops to fend it off to the on side, calls quickly for the run
license to whack, friendly short delivery down the leg side and Tendulkar swivels and helps it on its way with a stylish pull behind square, no yellow shirts at fine leg to cut that off
stays back and punches him to the on side
uses his wrists well to clip him firmly behind square, Watson's fielding quite square at fine leg
a friendly full toss on middle and leg easily put away past midwicket with a flick of the wrists, is it the dew acting up?
pushes it to mid-on and it's a front foot no-ball as well
Free Hit Excellent response from Bollinger as he fires it quick on the blockhole on the off stump, Tendulkar can only squirt it out
keeps it on middle and leg and tendulkar gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
half volley outside off and he firmly drives straight to mid-off, should have put that away
gives him width to drive through the off side and he obliges but places it straight to sweeper cover
stays beside the line and steers it just wide of backward point
angles it on the pads and he shuffles and clips him down to fine leg
fullish in length outside off and driven firmly down to sweeper cover
keeps it on middle and off and he defends with a dead bat

excellent placement and Marsh makes a really good attempt at long leg but in vain, Tendulkar known the fine leg is up and he gently tickles it wide of the fielder, Marsh charges from square leg, pulls it back on the dive but the ball rolls back
gets forward and defends with soft hands
lands outside off and he shoulders arms
stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
poor shot, Bollinger angles it outside off and cramps Kohli for a bit if room as he shapes to cut it square on the off side, he ends up getting a tame edge to the keeper
hops at the crease to fend it off to the in side and there;s a bit of hesitation in the calling, Yuvraj is sent back
bowls it a bit short outside off and he lets it go to the keeper
gets beside the line and punches it to the off side
bowls a half volley outside off and he drives straight to mid-off, good shot
holds the length back and he picks it from outside off and flicks it just wide of midwicket for a couple
gets behind the line and taps it down to cover
slower ball on the pads and he whips him on the up straight to midwicket
full outside off and he exploits the big gap at cover, the sweeper cuts it off
comes over the wicket to Yuvraj, keeps a bit lower than expected but he fends it off
flighted on middle and leg, pushed down to mid-on
flighted down the leg side and he works it behind square on the on side
full on middle and leg, he pushes it down the track to long-on
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
quicker through the air and defended very close to the pads
poor delivery, wide down the leg side and Yuvraj tries to sweep, the ball beats the keeper and it's four wides, Yuvraj reacts as if he got some bat on that but I didn't see any real evidence of bat
defended with soft hands
fires it on the blockhole outside off and Tendulkar squirts it out
close call there as Tendulkar gets a thick inside edge, the ball rolls to the off side and they complete a sharp single
Yuvraj is caught at the crease and expects it to bounce a bit more, he chops it to the on side
short and wide and cracked away, it was a certain four but the fielder at extra cover got a hand to it to save a couple surely
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
defended with soft hands to silly point
quicker through the air and clipped down to mid-on

we won't see 17,000 runs today, tosses it up on middle and gets it to turn in, Tendulkar tries to work it with the turn but the ball clips the pads, it wasn't really adjacent to the stumps but umpire de Silva was convinced. Not a very straightforward lbw and I want to see what Hawkeye has to show on that
full outside off and he reaches out to drive to long-off
good start this time, lands outside off and Dhoni steers him down to point
nice sharp bouncer, has Dhoni hopping at the crease, very close to gloving it to the keeper
full on the off stump and Dhoni pushes it to mid-off on the walk and challenges the fielder, well run
full and middle and leg and that's a nice crispy flick off the pads
stays back and fends him off to the off side
bowls a slower ball full outside off and it bounces twice before reaching the keeper, the ball rolls off the keeper's pads and they take a bye
full outside off and driven down to long-off
flighted outside off and defended with soft hands to the off side
flighted outside off, he reaches out and drives on the up down to sweeper cover
tossed up on the pads and clipped to backward square leg
flighted on middle and leg and turned to the on side
quick through the air and Yuvraj taps it down to cover
stays back and taps it back to the bowler
bangs it in short down the leg side and he nudges it down to fine leg rather uneasily
picks it from the middle stump and he clips it stylishly down to square leg
taps it to cover
sprays it wide outside off, left alone
nudges it to the on side
flighted on middle and leg, nudged to the on side
reaches out and drives just wide of cover
flighted on middle and leg, squeezed out to short midwicket
flighted down the leg side, pushed down to square leg
commits to the front foot and pushes it back to the bowler
that's a firm punch off the backfoot but mid-off does well to cut it off

yet another direct hit, he taps it down to short cover and challenges the fielder, Ponting gathers and fires a sideways throw at the stumps, Yuvraj is short of his ground and everyone knows it, the third umpire takes a look
takes a single to extra cover
good length outside off and defended to the off side
gets forward and defends with soft hands
pushes it through the line to long-off for a single
hits a good length outside off, he reaches out and slaps it down to sweeper cover
reaches out to drive but checks his shot and pushes it back to the bowler
pushed to cover
full and driven down the ground to long-off
almost edged this one, this one was short of a length and angling across him, he chased it but couldn't make contact
this was shorter and wider, and he reached out and cut it for a single
back of a length, on off, hit powerfully but the mid-off is up in the circle; hence a dot ball
angles this one into the pads, Dhoni goes back and turns it down to fine leg for an easy single
short and angling across the left-hand batsman, Raina opens the face and gets a single to third man
short one, looking to tuck him up, but this doesn't get high enough and an easy single to fine leg results
flighted, around the off stump, defended back to the bowler
arm ball, just short of a length, wide of off, Dhoni is made to play a late cut but is beaten by the straighter one
angling in to the pads, goes back and plays to square leg
another flighted delivery, Dhoni stretches forward and plays it one bounce to Hauritz
another flighted delivery, hint of drift, Dhoni stretches forward and defends again
another forward-defensive but this time the break takes the inside half of the bat. Dhoni is safe but this is a maiden over
angled across Raina, and he takes a single to third man
that takes off from nowhere, effort ball, but not too short, and the bounce surprises Dhoni who is looking for a wide, but the umpire calls it the one bouncer for the over
now Dhoni gets the wide call, but this is down the leg side, he was looking to walk down the track but Henriques missed his mark
back of a length, pushed off the back foot but straight to midwicket
similar delivery, similar shot, but this time straighter, and he gets a single down to long-on
goes round the stumps now, looking to tuck Raina up, short-of-a-length delivery, and there is no room for Raina this time
this one is wider, and Raina can easily open the face and get one to third man
length ball, shaping away, Raina guides it square of third man and gets a couple
this is short, gives him room, is cut away powerfully but straight to sweeper-cover
sharp inward movement, back of a length, pitches off, and cuts back in, but Watson knows it's going down so doesn't appeal
fuller this time, room is there, and Dhoni flashes at it, clearing backward point and getting two - ended up slicing it. Seems they are targeting Watson here
adjusts the length, goes shorter, and Dhoni pushes it to mid-off
edged for four, slightly shorter than the previous ball, and slightly wider, Dhoni throws his arms at it, gets a powerful edge fine of third man - first boundary since the 14th over
slower ball, Raina gets on the front foot, waits for the ball to arrive and then runs it down to third man
walks down the track again, Henriques shortens the length a touch, but Dhoni manages to turn it to fine leg for a single
angled into the pads, Raina gets across, inside the line, and plays it down to fine leg
hint of swing, fuller delivery, Dhoni looks to play a forceful shot, gets a thick inside edge towards short midwicket
good shot, gooood shot, and that's because there wasn't much room to cut this one. The length allowed the shot, but he cut it from top of off, beating backward point by a bit and third man by a lot
follows it up with an easy single, gets in line with the shortish delivery and turns it towards square leg
full ball angling into off and middle, pushed towards midwicket
Watson angles into the pads once again and Dhoni plays the ball to deep backward square
Watson hits a good length and seams the ball across the left-hander, Raina pokes without movie his feet and gets beaten
steered off the back foot towards point where Hussey dives to his left and stops the ball
played with an angled bat towards third man
Dhoni cuts the short of a length ball to third man
Gone! It was the strangler down the leg side. It bounced outside leg and Dhoni tried to glance it but got a thin feather through to the keeper. And he walked. How vital is this?
goes for the yorker but slips it wide down the leg side
outside off stump, full in length, beaten on the loose drive
good delivery, bouncing back in, Jadeja tries to let it go but it rolls off his gloves to the slip cordon
leans forward to defend to the off side
leans forward to push it to left of mid-off for a single
turns this back-of-length delivery to square-leg
hmm.. fullish delivery around the off stump, Raina goes for a big swing across the line but edges it to midwicket
pushed towards  point for a quick single and Hussey rushes in to pick up the ball and almost collides with Jadeja. Both have a big laugh as Hussey envelops Jadeja with a big hug
slanted across Jadeja who lets that ball go through to the keeper
bangs it in short but it doesn't climb all that high; Raina sways away from the line and the ball dips to bounce once before it reached Manou
really full in length but Raina is caught at the crease; just about leans forward at the last moment to push it back to the bowler. Was he expecting a short one?
back of length, comes in from outside off, steered past the diving point fielder for couple of runs
lands short, Raina hops but realises that the ball, again, wasn't going to climb all that much and gets into position to defend
short in length outside off, punched away sweetly but Hussey does well to lunge to his right to make the stop at point
lovely delivery, landing on a length just outside off and held its line; Raina tried to open the bat-face and run it to third man but is beaten
nudged off the pads on the leg side, not sure if he got bat on it but the batsmen scamper through
bowled him!! Hauritz draws Raina forward with his length, pitches on middle and turns past Raina's timid prod to hit off stump, massive blow and Australia are on their way here
that's wide outside off stump, Harbhajan reached out for it but missed
played carefully on the front foot towards cover
defended once again, 94 off 92 balls now
that's drilled through the covers! Harbhajan swings his arms hard and sends the ball racing along the ground for four
Hauritz bowls a straighter one, Harbhajan plays for turn and gets beaten
hits a good length right away, Jadeja gets behind the line and blocks
too short, too wide. Jadeja stands tall on the back foot, jumps a little, and cuts the ball wide of the fielder on the third man boundary
Johnson bowls fuller and straighter, Jadeja flicks through square leg
Johnson bounces Harbhajan, but the umpire says it's too high
launched over extra cover! Johnson goes full and wide, Harbhajan winds up and sends the ball flat over the infield, it beats the fielder on the boundary
shorter length on off stump, defended off the back foot, he's cracked his bat and wants a new one
shorter length again and Harbhajan nudges to the leg side to keep strike
Harbhajan sweeps, doesn't get it past short fine leg but they run the single
Jadeja takes a long stride forward and blocks watchfully
Hauritz beats Jadeja with the flight and the batsman tries to cut but fails
defended on the leg side
he bowls this quicker and angles into the pads, nudged behind square for one
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
massive appeal for lbw after Jadeja misses the flick but I'm sure that pitched outside leg stump
played off the front foot towards cover
short of a length and straight from Watson, Jadeja stays in his crease, gets behind the line and defends
short of a length again and once again Jadeja can't do much with it but play to the bowler
played off the back foot towards Ponting at cover
excellent line and length from Watson, he's been spot on this whole over, Jadeja defends the final ball on the off side
Harbhajan was thinking about going after Hauritz but was beaten in the flight and had to defend
driven off the front foot to cover
tossed up outside off stump, Harbhajan leans forward and pushes the ball towards deep cover

a massive mix-up and Jadeja's gone! Jadeja pushes the ball quite firmly towards cover and calls Harbhajan for a non-existent single, especially since it's Ponting swooping on the ball. Jadeja keeps going and it's too late by the time he realises Harbhajan isn't coming, Ponting throws the ball to Manou who breaks the stumps with Jadeja yards short
played to cover point of the back foot
loud appeal for lbw as Praveen gets hit on the pad but it's outside the line of off stump
edged, wide of the keeper and four! Harbhajan was squared up by Watson and he was trying to close the face and play on the leg side, it was a thick edge and just wide of Manou
fuller length on off stump, Harbhajan plays towards cover
Harbhajan clears his front leg and swings hard at one, he doesn't connect properly and hits the ball behind square
short of a length over the stumps, Praveen fends and misses
Watson slants the ball into Praveen who nudges on the leg side, Harbhajan wants the single but Praveen sends him back, he might have been out had the throw from midwicket hit the stumps
Praveen backs away and tries to hit the ball on to the car that's driving away from the PCA stadium, Watson's length is good and he misses
caught! but in the crowd! Harbhajan slogs across the line, hits the ball on the rise from outside off and sends it soaring over deep midwicket
Harbhajan swings again but this time the inside edge goes towards deep square leg
length delivery outside off, Praveen drives and connects with the bottom of the bat, they run a single to mid off
Harbhajan swings hard and across the line again, he's getting predictable now and Johnson beats him with a slower one
he walks down the pitch and swats a length delivery fiercely past the bowler, mid on won't stop that
Harbhajan steps out again but this time Johnson greets him with a fast bouncer, Harbhajan hooks, or tries to, but doesn't connect
Praveen pushes the ball through point for a single, Praveen wants the second but slips, there was no second in it anyway
Harbhajan clears his front foot out of the way and hits to mid-on, Bollinger was looking for the yorker
what sort of a short is that? Harbhajan backs away and plays an inside out slap over extra cover, sort of like a tennis forehand, he's got the job done though and found the boundary
Bollinger bowls full and wide and beats the bat
full toss, Harbhajan walks down and hits it firmly towards midwicket where it is intercepted, India reach 200
too full and Praveen winds up and crashes it wide of the fielder at mid-off for four, these two are turning it on again

caught and bowled! Watson delivers a full ball, Harbhajan tries to hit it straight but is through the shot too early, he hits it to Watson's right and the bowler takes a smart reflex catch, that's the end of Harbhajan feisty challenge
Nehra gets a bit of inside edge on to the pad for a run behind square
Praveen tries to hit the ball down the ground but plays it back to the bowler
played from the crease straight to White at midwicket
Praveen walks towards the leg side and hammers a length ball through extra cover, that's four once it beats the infield
he tries to hit through the off but gets an inside edge on to the pad, the ball goes on the off side and the batsmen run one
Praveen tries to go over cover and gets a thick edge down to third man for one
full ball angling into the pads, nudged towards midwicket for a single
Praveen swings hard but doesn't connect, Bollinger's pitching it just short of a length
Praveen tries to make room but Bollinger follows him with a short of a length delivery, he has to defend in the end
backed away and smashed! Praveen move to leg side, winds up and carves a short and wide ball over point for four
terrific comeback from Bollinger, hits a good length on off stump and forces Praveen to defend, the batting Powerplay is now over
played back to the bowler off the back foot
short of a length outside off, steered to third man for one
Praveen sees the full length and tries to smack it straight past the bowler, he doesn't connect
edged and taken! Praveen is caught on the crease by a short of a length delivery, he gets a thick edge and Manou snaps it up, Praveen angled his bat and it nearly went off the face
good length on off stump, played on the off side
width offered outside off and Ishant hits the ball through point, Marsh fields on the boundary
short ball angling across the right-hander, Ishant lets it go
banged in short again but this time the line is down leg side and that's a wide
short of a length and straight this time, Ishant gets behind the line and defends
short again and Ishant steers the ball through point for one

Nehra makes room and hoicks the ball - it was that ugly! - over midwicket, he's placed it in the gap and just beats the fielder on the boundary, Marsh made a super effort to pull that in but he couldn't
Johnson bowls a slow bouncer and it gets called wide again
slower ball, a full one this time, and Nehra gets beaten
defended on the front foot, I'm not too sure we'll see Johnson again tonight, wonder why Ponting isn't bowling Siddle ...
Watson was so close to hitting the stumps! Ishant backed away and swung hard but missed
defended on the front foot towards midwicket, close call at the bowler's end had Ponting hit
played off the back foot through point for one
that's the end of the game! Nehra tries to clear the boundary but skies the ball high in the air towards long-on where Hauritz pedals backwards and holds a well-judged catch
